title: King Tut Died Long Ago, but the Debate About His Tomb Rages On
description: Maybe the walls are disguising the undiscovered burial chamber of Nefertiti. Or “maybe it’s Al Capone’s safe.”
dc:creator: Franz Lidz
media:description: Tourists looking at the tomb of King Tut, as displayed in a glass case at the Valley of the Kings in Luxor, Egypt, in November 2015.
